Title: Triple 9
Overview: A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.
Tagline: The Code on the Street is Never Black & White
production_companies: Worldview Entertainment, Anonymous Content, MadRiver Pictures, Sierra Pictures, Surefire Capital
Cast: Casey Affleck, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Woody Harrelson
